page.title: 18WHAT TO ENJOY IN FINZEAN.
page.content: Tourists enjoy the{beauty, serenity, {and welcoming ambience}of the valley. {The Dardanus Stone,}opposite the War Memorial on Corsdarder hill,is said to mark where this Celtic chief fell in battle. It was broken during road improvements,hence the iron bars clamping it together. {The Long Cairn}is a Bronze Age burial site,complying with the specific measurements used.It is in the woods behind the War Memorial to the South. {The Joined Trees}are two Scots Pines at Woodside of Ennochie joined by a common branch. {Mill of Clenter}meal mill,on the River Feugh,was used to grind or bruise oats :meantime in need of repair and renovation,unlike the sawmill and turning mill further upriver,also water powered but in full production.
